      • playAt

        public void playAt(int i)
        Implement play when corresponding board area is pressed. Called in response to an action listener on the button.
        Parameters:
        i - player's move at location i in 1D game board

      • nextMove

        public void nextMove()
        Compute and play computer's next move.

      • findMove

        public int findMove()
        Compute computer's next move with negamax algorithm. No alpha-beta pruning. just the simple algorithm.
        Returns:
        computer's next move according to negamax

      • negamax

        public int negamax(char[] g,
          int counting,
          char current)
        negamax algorithm. Iterates through the possible trees, stopping at a win or draw in each subtree. Used the wiki algorithm as reference but simplified it.
        Parameters:
        g - gameboard
        counting - # of plays in game so far
        current - char that represents current player
        Returns:
        product of minimax

      • possibleMoves

        public java.lang.Object[] possibleMoves(char[] g)
        Array of possible moves on current game board
        Parameters:
        g - gameboard
        Returns:
        array of empty & possible positions

      • nextPlayer

        public char nextPlayer(char c)
        Switch player from 'O' to 'X' and vice versa
        Parameters:
        c - char to be switched (either 'O' or 'X')
        Returns:
        player with next turn

      • win

        public boolean win(char[] g)
        Check for a win on given game board.
        Parameters:
        g - game board
        Returns:
        true is there is a win, else false

      • winHorizontal

        public boolean winHorizontal(char[] game)
        Check for a horizontal win on current game board. Update a variable to store the player that wins.
        Parameters:
        game - game board
        Returns:
        true is there is a win, else false

      • winVertical

        public boolean winVertical(char[] game)

        Returns:
        true is there is a win, else false
